page.title: 13Carnival Day and Fete.
page.content: {Carnival Day}was on Whitsun Bank Holiday Monday May 27. The Carnival procession consisted of{16 floats (people dressed up on backs of lorries) Queens, bands and individuals dressed up. Some of the{floats {depicted}television programmes. The Brownies portrayed a banquetting hall in the time of Richard 3rd. The Cubs went as Cubs in space . The Queens were crowned and the winners announced before the various stalls were opened. {Stalls}included{crazy golf}where you had to hit the{golfballs}through {obstacles; soak the scout}where you had to throw a ball at the target so that the bucket of water would pour onto the scout;{coconut shy}where if you knocked the coconut down with the ball you kept it.
